metadata.title: CVE-2014-9236 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in php/edit_photos.php in Zoph(aka Zoph Organizes Photos) 0.9.1 and earlier allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) photographer_id or (2)_crumb parameter.

criterions.comment: zoph package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
